path.style: fill-opacity: 0; paint-order: stroke; fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke: rgb(83, 191, 0); stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 3px;

polygon.style: fill: rgb(217, 202, 0); stroke-width: 0.72px; stroke: rgb(144, 144, 144); fill-opacity: 0.6;
stroke-width: 0.72px; stroke: rgb(144, 144, 144); fill-opacity: 0.6; fill: rgb(51, 68, 255);
stroke-width: 0.72px; stroke: rgb(144, 144, 144); fill-opacity: 0.6; fill: rgb(255, 28, 28);
